code: import _objectSpread from"/home/jears0177/2021/deploy-workshop/client/node_modules/babel-preset-react-app/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2";var SET_LOGIN='SET_LOGIN';var SET_PASSWORD='SET_PASSWORD';var SET_IS_AUTH='SET_IS_AUTH';var CLEAR_LOGIN_DATA='CLEAR_LOGIN_DATA';var LOGOUT='LOGOUT';var initialState={login:'',password:'',isAuthenticated:false};export var loginReducer=function loginReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case SET_LOGIN:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{login:action.payload});case SET_PASSWORD:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{password:action.payload});case SET_IS_AUTH:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{isAuthenticated:action.payload});case CLEAR_LOGIN_DATA:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{login:'',password:''});case LOGOUT:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{isAuthenticated:false});default:return state;}};export var setLoginData=function setLoginData(data){return{type:SET_LOGIN,payload:data};};export var setPasswordData=function setPasswordData(data){return{type:SET_PASSWORD,payload:data};};export var setIsAuth=function setIsAuth(data){return{type:SET_IS_AUTH,payload:data};};export var clearLoginData=function clearLoginData(){return{type:CLEAR_LOGIN_DATA};};export var logout=function logout(){return{type:LOGOUT};};
